title: can we get a mute button for that riot kayle
body: 15 second cooldown and it lasts 10 seconds so i gotta listen to that fucking annoying as fuck siren for 66% of my laning phase its driving me crazy slap a mute button up on dat bitch asap plz and thank you

replies.body: or you could just turn down your champion sounds in the menu like a normal person...
He likes to hear other things.
if you turn this down or play the game on mute, if you get a kled or sion in ranked there is no counterplay. They'll come out of nowhere and now you're dead.
"i will murder you whole family " this is what kled says ad yet Graves cant get his cigar back, RIOT is shit fkin crap people
>Refusing to understand why Graves' cigar was removed

That's why Kayle is one of the strongest top laners atm, because she can tilt her opponents so easily ;)
It's like Riot Blitzcrank on Urf... just constant WEEOOWEEOOO

I love it.
